title: Bamboo Stand
description: You get an ergonomic stand made of natural bamboo. By pledging $25 or more, you've helped us launch our promotional campaign, and you’ll be added to a special Backer member list.

title: Black Edition Stand
description: You get a Black Special Edition computer stand and a personal thank you. By pledging $75 or more, you’ll be added to our Backer member list. Shipping is included.

title: Mahogany Special Edition
description: You get two Special Edition Mahogany stands, a Backer T-Shirt, and a personal thank you. By pledging $200 or more, you’ll be added to our Backer member list. Shipping is included.
